Package com.financetracker.manager

Class TransactionManager

java.lang.Object
com.financetracker.manager.TransactionManager
public class TransactionManager extends Object
Class for managing user transactions Uses ArrayList and Stack data structures

      Returns:
      true if successful, false if no transaction to restore
